DOC.brief_summary: Key objectives clinical study : - Determine well intramuscular ( IM ) olanzapine depot work compare placebo - Evaluate safety tolerability IM olanzapine depot compare placebo - Evaluate different dos IM olanzapine depot compare placebo identify best dose ( ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Intramuscular Olanzapine Depot With Placebo Treatment Patients With Schizophrenia

However , patient one seizures past identifiable etiology , etiology resolve , patient may enter .
